## DocumentResource.update() method

Updates the specified document.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
update(packageId: string, documentId: string, payload: Partial<DocumentMetadata>, documentBody?: Requests.DocumentBody): Promise<DocumentMetadata>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  packageId | string | Package ID |
|  documentId | string | ID of the document to be updated |
|  payload | Partial&lt;[DocumentMetadata](./onespan-sign-node.documentmetadata.md)<!-- -->&gt; | Updated metadata of the document |
|  documentBody | Requests.[DocumentBody](./onespan-sign-node.documentbody.md) | (Optional) data to replace the document |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;[DocumentMetadata](./onespan-sign-node.documentmetadata.md)<!-- -->&gt;

Updated metadata of the document
